Package io.github.ai4ci.functions

Interface Interpolator

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
LoessInterpolator
All Known Implementing Classes:
LinearInterpolator, SplineInterpolator
public interface Interpolator extends Serializable
Interface for mathematical interpolation functions.

Provides interpolation capabilities with numerical differentiation support for use in mathematical modeling and curve fitting operations.

      Clamps a value between specified lower and upper bounds.

      Returns:

    • differential

      default double differential(double x)
      Computes the numerical derivative at the given point.
      Parameters:
      x - the point at which to compute the derivative
      Returns:
      the numerical derivative using central difference method
